title: Assassin’s Creed: Valhalla Lead Steps Down - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.24.20
description:
The creative director of Assassin's Creed: Valhalla has stepped down as the video game industry reels from a round of allegations. 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
TONIGHT @ 6 pm! TWITCH.TV/SADBOYBARRETT. On my stream tonight I'm raising money for the trevor project and if I hit my goal (which is only $100 because I have a small twitch following), I'm giving away Spongebob on PS4 along with some of the things from the F.U.N. Edition.
9 am Cyberpunk Tomorrow! Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. Blessing will have played, so expect a Gamescast after.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: 
Mohammed Mohammed
Conner Nolan
Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:45 - Sexual Misconduct Allegations in Games
00:12:27 - “As an ally: What can I do to help?” - The Wrong Shaun
00:26:48 - New Pokemon Game Announced
00:33:00 - Halo Transmission
00:39:00 - SKATE and APEX NUGGETS
00:42:00 - New THPS Skaters
00:43:26 - PlayStation Bug Bounty
00:45:00 - Out today
00:47: 55-  Ad  
 Reader mail   -
00:49:52 - “I just got done listening to the latest PS I Love You with a question regarding crunch and naughty dog.” - Quiso
00:56:44 - You‘re Wrong
01:00:24 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
